title: Conceptual metaphor in the victims of Sidoarjo mud flow problem as seen in the editorial of Kompas Daily
abstract: This research explores the conceptual metaphor that Kompas Daily uses in its editorial to describe the victims of Sidoarjo mud flow. It investigates one research question, that is what conceptual metaphor that Kompas Daily uses for the victims of Sidoarjo mud flow. This research analyzes the editorials of Kompas Daily which investigate the issue of Sidoarjo mud flow problem. Those editorials are analyzed by using the Critical Metaphor Analysis method. Using this method, the writer conducts three steps in analyzing and investigating the editorials. The steps are metaphor identification, metaphor interpretation, and metaphor explanation. The result of the analysis is Kompas Daily employs the conceptual metaphor VICTIMS AS THE OPPRESSED.
